desc: Bmeters GSD8-i, GMDM-i and WDE-K50 water meters available from official UK distributor Stockshed. Manufactured in Italy, BMeters offer best in class specification, performance, accuracy and reliability, the BMeters range is a global leader for water meter design and long life service.

layout.text: accurate. reliable. dependable. WRAS & MID approved water meters in the UK.

Stockshed® is a UK metering company offering best in class water meters for quality, performance, accuracy and reliability.
Long life service comes as standard across our complete range.
